title: How to Make a Mushroom House in Minecraft

steps.title: Get a red mushroom and bonemeal.
steps.content: Get a red mushroom and bonemeal. Find a mushroom in dark places. Get bonemeal by placing one bone on the crafting grid.

steps.title: Use the bonemeal on a red mushroom on the ground.
steps.content: Use the bonemeal on a red mushroom on the ground. The size for grown red mushroom are: 5x5x6.

steps.title: Get some ladders.
steps.content: Get some ladders. Attach the ladders on 3 blocks of the trunk, closest to the ground.

steps.title: Build the floor.
steps.content: Build the floor. Use any material to cover the inside of the mushroom. Light up the inside with a torch.

steps.title: Place a bed on the inside, and a crafting table.
steps.content: Place a bed on the inside, and a crafting table.
